meanings.sent1: The trinity of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent2: The trinity of red, blue, and yellow are primary colors.
meanings.sent3: The trinity of kittens played together in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The trinity of flavors in the dish danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The trinity of shapes formed an interesting pattern on the wall.

meanings.definition: A group of three closely related persons or things.
meanings.sent1: The trinity of siblings always stuck together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent2: The trinity of best friends shared everything with each other.
meanings.sent3: The trinity of trees in the backyard whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The trinity of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The trinity of books on the shelf were all mysteries.

meanings.definition: The union of three persons in one Godhead in Christianity.
meanings.sent1: The trinity of Father, Son, and Holy Spirit is a fundamental belief in Christianity.
meanings.sent2: The trinity of God is a mystery that many Christians contemplate.
meanings.sent3: The trinity of angels sang hymns in the celestial choir.
meanings.sent4: The trinity of virtues - faith, hope, and love - guides believers.
meanings.sent5: The trinity of saints interceded for the faithful in times of need.
